title: [K-12] Design and Implementation of MOOC Lecture Video Styles

context.prior_knowledge: Basic learning theories and digital content development experience
context.additional_context: Learner roles (students/job seekers), language domain expertise (intermediate), digital device-provided environment

learning_goals: Learners can classify seven core styles of MOOC videos (speaker-centered/board-centered) and explain the educational effectiveness of each style.
Learners can select video styles tailored to learner characteristics (arts/humanities: speaker-centered, engineering/sciences: board-centered).
Learners can complete the actual MOOC lecture video production process through PBL (Project-Based Learning) collaborative projects.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
